title: OCR Online Platform Allows Developers to Pose HIPAA Questions
text:
09 OCR Online Platform Allows Developers to Pose HIPAA Questions 
Healthcare Informatics: The Department of Health and Human Services' Office for Civil Rights (OCR) has launched a new platform allowing mobile health developers to ask questions about HIPAA privacy protection.
